front.title: Security Protocols for Version 2 of the Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMPv2)

abstract.t: In the Administrative Infrastructure for SNMPv2 document [1], each SNMPv2 party is, by definition, associated with a single authentication protocol and a single privacy protocol. It is the purpose of this document, Security Protocols for SNMPv2, to define one such authentication and one such privacy protocol.
